author: Cat Ellis
title: Candy Crush Saga: get free, unlimited lives this week
description: Stay indoors, stay safe, and match colorful candies to your heart's content.
content:
If you're feeling bored at home this week, mobile developer King has just the thing: free, unlimited lives for Candy Crush Saga, so you can keep swapping and matching virtual candies to your heart's content.
The giveaway, which also includes six of King's ot… [+819 chars]
